name: Ant Wilson
title: Co-Founder & CTO
bio: Co-Founder, CTO, and Chief Meme Officer at Supabase. Ant is a 3x venture backed founder with an MSc in Software Engineering from Imperial College London.
abstract: Ant explores how the Supabase architecture enables "Supa"-DX. Open source and modular technology choices enable Supabase to lower the barrier to deploying backends for your apps and services. We'll explore all the major DX touch points within Supabase, and how we obsess about improving them constantly.
